line.text: The receptionist leans on the desk and sighs. He looks up from the computer, towards the security guard standing near the seating area.
"Man, could this day be any longer?"
The receptionist shrugs. "Looks to me like it's fate's day off."
As he turns back to the computer, he notices you and clears his throat.
"Hey, holster that firearm! No open carry allowed here."
"Hey, put away that rifle! No open carry allowed here."
"Hey, put that away! No open carry allowed here. And that applies to ALL weapons, not just guns."
